history.proof: intros A' P cP1 cP2 H1 H2. unfold Lindenbaum_ensures in *. intros. hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A P cP1 cP2 H1 H2.

ctx: intros A' P cP1 cP2 H1 H2.
intros A' P cP1 cP2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A', P, cP1 : Ensemble A -> Prop cP2 : forall (CA : Countable A) (init : Ensemble A), A' init -> P (LindenbaumConstruction CA init A') H1 : forall (CA : Countable A) (init : Ensemble A), A' init -> cP1 (LindenbaumConstruction CA init A') H2 : Countable A init : Ensemble A H : A' init Unable to unify "forall x : ?A, Ensembles.In ?A (Intersection ?A ?M2020 ?M2021) x -> Ensembles.In ?A ?M2022 x" with "Intersection (Ensemble A) P cP1 (LindenbaumConstruction H2 init A')".

original: intros A P cP1 cP2 H1 H2. unfold Lindenbaum_ensures in *. intros CA init Hinit. apply Intersection1_Included. apply H1 with (CA := CA) (init := init); auto. apply H2 with (CA := CA) (init := init); auto.
